snippet.title: Rest Trailer
snippet.description:
Rest is an exploration game where you explore a monochrome world while a single color leads you forward. You will experience a journey through the somber world of Rest as you traverse the five stages of grief.

Platform:  Steam, Itch.io, Pc
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1100320/Rest/
https://sleepy-turtles.itch.io/rest
